title: #4, 2 Br/1Bath furnished apt near TX Med Ctr- Rice Univ
map_address: 3831 North Braeswood Blvd near Stella Link
app_fee: $60.  Waived for students with valid student ID.
posting_body: Furnished 2 bedroom/one bathroom apartment near Texas Medical Center (TMC), Rice University, University of Houston and Houston Downtown.
Bus stop to the TMC is in our front yard.

Features one queen bed in one bedroom, and two twin size beds in the second bedroom with a walk-in closet, all ceramic tile floor, full size kitchen (new gas stove, microwave, full size refrigerator), large bathroom, sofa with queen size bed/ coffee table/TV in living room, dining table and chairs, washer/dryer in the same floor, covered/uncovered parking, safe neighborhood, close to shopping centers, ball games and entertainment and much more.
Biking trail, Parks and the YMCA are within a walking distance.
Bus Stop is in our front yard with bus every 10 minutes to Texas Medical Center, Rice University, University of Houston and downtown (save gas, parking, car repairs, car insurance,...etc.).
Wi-Fi Internet and all utilities included except electricity.
Student rate for 12-month lease for 2 students or medical residents.
For other than students or medical residents or for 4 -to-9-month lease, the rent is 20% higher.
